Auth.forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we will send you a password reset link.

Errors.credentials_do_not_match: These credentials do not match our records.
Errors.email_string: The email must be a string.
Errors.email_lowercase: The email must be in lowercase.
Errors.email_max_255: The email must not be greater than 255 characters.
Errors.email_unique: The email has already been taken.
Errors.invalid_password_reset_token: This password reset token is invalid.
Errors.name_string: The name must be a string.
Errors.name_max_255: The name must not be greater than 255 characters.
Errors.password_string: The password must be a string.
Errors.password_confirmed: The password confirmation does not match.
Errors.password_min_8: The password must be at least 8 characters.
Errors.too_many_attempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again in a few minutes.
Errors.user_not_found_with_email: We can't find a user with that email address.

Success.password_reset_link_sent: We have emailed your password reset link.
